title: The Stolzfus keenspiracy
content:
Now everyone knows I'm evil, but what about Galaxieretter? Everyone thinks he's Mr Innocent don't they?

Or is he?

We all know how Keen made it to the pyramid of the forbidden in Keen 4, but how did the Shikadai? Presumably the same way Keen did.

This is where things get interesting...

Now Gals' last name is Stolzfus, an Americianisation of his origional name, Stoltzfu [Ask yourself, why did he emigrate, and what was he running from?] Translated this means 'surefooted' but direct translation gives us Proud foot'

Now; Keen used a foot, a surprisingly human looking foot; a german looking foot too. And Gal is 18 [Thats 3 + 15]

Coincidence? I think not.

And finally, we've all seen Gal, does he look like a sane man?




A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: The Stolzfus keenspiracy
content: Umm... lay off the Schnapps, perhaps?
